descriptionHtml:
I WON\"T BE DOING ANY FURTHER UPDATES OR FIXES

-------EDIT------
After a bit of soul searching, i\'ve decided to scrap the mod. Problem is, when i first started it, i knew absolutely nothing about the CK. So i think i might have made some mistakes early on which are now ingrained into the core .esp and may cause unknown effects in the worldspace.

I\'ve learned a hell of a lot building this mod, so i\'m gonna keep the interiors, which i still love and totally rebuilt the exterior from the ground up in a fresh .esp probably in a different location, one that\'s not used by any popular mods, to avoid conflicts.

The original idea of the mod was to built a player home for myself to use from the beginning of my next play through... but i\'ve spent so much time staring at this damn place i don\'t even really want to use it myself anymore! The next build should be a lot quicker now i know what i\'m doing, so hopefully i\'ll still be able to enjoy it myself lol

anyways, cheers all.. and i\'ll be back ;-) 

--------
author: Bludgeon
